race.name: Demon
race.location: Hero Cave, Ferumbras' Citadel, Goroma, Ghostlands (Warlock area; unreachable), Liberty Bay (hidden underground passage; unreachable), Razzachai, deep in Pits of Inferno (found in every throneroom except Verminor's), deep Formorgar Mines, Demon Forge, Alchemist Quarter, Magician Quarter, Chyllfroest, Oramond Dungeon, Abandoned Sewers.

race.name: crocodile
race.location: In the crocodile cave and the jungle east of Port Hope as well as the swamp to the north, Fenrock, Arena and Zoo Quarter, Trade Quarter, Talahu, also located on Meriana and Laguna Islands.
